text: Fabrizio Romano (born 21 February 1993) is an Italian football journalist. He worked for Sky Sport Italy and is considered one of the most informed and reliable sources for transfer market news. ==Early and personal life== Romano was born in Naples on 21 February 1993. He attended the Catholic University of the Sacred Heart in Milan. Romano is a fan of the Championship club Watford. He is multilingual and speaks English, Spanish, Italian and Portuguese. Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Italian journalists
title: Fabrizio Romano
